channel.title: Beardy Dads | Beardy Dads
channel.description: A podcast about being a dad from @rooreynolds and @knolleary

item.title: Episode 31: One Year Later
item.dc:creator: Nick
item.description: Episode 31 marks the first birthday of this podcast. We catch up on what happened over Christmas, how you handle the (spoiler alert) truth about Santa Claus and the Tooth Fairy and what the future holds for this podcast. Having … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Episode 31 marks the first birthday of this podcast. We catch up on what happened over Christmas, how you handle the (spoiler alert) truth about Santa Claus and the Tooth Fairy and what the future holds for this podcast.

Having recorded 31 episodes over the year, we’ve decided to draw this current chapter to a close. This isn’t the last episode by any means, we’re not stopping, just slowing down.

Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast or find us in iTunes and leave a review.

If you have any tips, questions or general feedback you can email us at podcast@beardydads.co.uk, leave a comment below or tweet us.

item.title: Episode 14: High Chairs
item.dc:creator: Nick
item.description: We’re back with more tips, reckons and contributions. Swimming, high chairs and photography are all discussed thanks to listener contributions. Have something you’d like us to talk about? Then get in touch! Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
We’re back with more tips, reckons and contributions. Swimming, high chairs and photography are all discussed thanks to listener contributions. Have something you’d like us to talk about? Then get in touch!

Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast or find us in iTunes and leave a review.

If you have any tips, questions or general feedback you can email us at podcast@beardydads.co.uk, leave a comment below or tweet us.

Links
  • Wes points us at uSwim Australia’s videos for swimming tips
  • Nick heartily recommends the simple but effective IKEA Anilop high chair
  • The Philips AVENT SCF332/01 is letting Roo take a turn with feeding
  • Roo has been reading The Wonder Weeks by Hetty Van de Rijt and Frans Plooij
  • Darren really knows how to take photos

item.title: Episode 10: #stubblerash
item.dc:creator: Nick

Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast or find us in iTunes and leave a review.

If you have any tips, questions or general feedback you can email us at podcast@beardydads.co.uk, leave a comment below or tweet us. Send us a 1-3 minute recording and we’ll include you in a future episode – go on, it’s really easy and free!

Links

  • Cheeky Wipes
  • The Nappy Lady

item.title: Episode 8: Car Seats
item.dc:creator: Nick
item.description: Two months in and we’re still going strong. The world of car seats and photo books are amongst the topics up for discussion, along with a slightly unusual contribution. Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast or find us … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Two months in and we’re still going strong. The world of car seats and photo books are amongst the topics up for discussion, along with a slightly unusual contribution.

Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast or find us in iTunes and leave a review.

If you have any tips, questions or general feedback you can email us at podcast@beardydads.co.uk, leave a comment below or tweet us. Send us a 1-3 minute recording and we’ll include you in a future episode.

Links
  • Car seats
    • Roo has a Maxi Cosi Pebble with the Family Fix base.
    • Nick has a Maxi Cosi CabrioFix, also with the Family Fix base, a Maxi Cosi Priori XP toddler seat and a Maxi Cosi RodiFix child seat
  • Blurb, Lulu and PhotoBox for photo book printing
  • One Bad Mother and Scummy Mummies – podcasts by unbeardy not-dads
  • Chox-Mak Ft. DJ YRS Jerzy – Jax Da Ripper – linked without comment
  • Rockabye Baby – lullaby renditions of baby’s favorite rock bands

item.title: Episode 7: Quantified

  • Sunshine Kids Easy View Back Seat Mirror

item.title: Episode 5: Correspondence
item.dc:creator: Nick
item.description: This week we hear from David Monro on his experiences of having twins and answer some listener questions. We talk about how we handled the news of impending fatherhood, managed our paternity leave and came up with baby names. Download … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
This week we hear from David Monro on his experiences of having twins and answer some listener questions. We talk about how we handled the news of impending fatherhood, managed our paternity leave and came up with baby names.

    Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast or find us in iTunes and leave a review.

    Many thanks to David, Andy Feltham, Mike Perry, Derek Murphy and Andrew Fitzpatrick for getting in contact.

    If you have any tips, questions or general feedback you can email us at podcast@beardydads.co.uk, leave a comment below or tweet us.

    Links
    • Andy Feltham recommends bestbabymonitorapp.com.
    • Andrew Fitzpatrick points us at Purple crying and an article on the BBC giving ‘tips for new parents‘.
    • Tommy Tippee Sangenic nappy bin

item.title: Episode 4: Monitors
item.dc:creator: Nick
item.description: With Nick’s baby now overdue, we stay on schedule for episode 4. We compare notes on baby monitors, getting sleep and answer a listener’s baby-throwing question. We also hear from listener, Rob Grundel, on how he prepared his 3 year … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
With Nick’s baby now overdue, we stay on schedule for episode 4. We compare notes on baby monitors, getting sleep and answer a listener’s baby-throwing question. We also hear from listener, Rob Grundel, on how he prepared his 3 year old son for the arrival of his new baby brother.

Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast or find us in iTunes and leave a review!

If you want to contribute, you can email us at podcast@beardydads.co.uk, leave a comment below or tweet us.

Links
  • Being n-fifths engaged can mean either how much of the head is above the pelvis or in the pelvis, confusingly
  • Roo has been using a Fitbit Flex to monitor how much exercise hes not doing and how much sleep hes not getting
  • Roo’s recommended book: Good Night, Sleep Tight by Kim West
  • NCT Bednest
  • Baby monitors
    • Tommee Tippee digital video monitor
    • BT 250 Digital Baby Monitor
    • Wired: Hackers are exploiting baby monitors
  • Guest contributor: Rob Grundel @robgrundel
    • Baby Monitor 3G
    • Book: Save Our Sleep by Tizzie Hall
  • Corner Protectors from IKEA
  • Registering a birth
  • @iTunesPodcasts likes our pitfalls and pratfalls, apparently

Download this episode or subscribe to the podcast.

You can now also find us in iTunes. If you have anything to share with us, you can email us at podcast@beardydads.co.uk, leave a comment below or tweet us.
